about_the_game:
Back to the machick!

The anti-magic toads have returned, stronger and shrouded in mystery, threatening everything once again. In Machick 2, ancient forces awaken as you craft even more powerful wands, uncover hidden secrets, and face an ominous new menace. With greater challenges, untold powers, and countless upgrades, the journey ahead is more perilous than ever. Will you rise to meet the unknown?

New visuals, new features, a totally new world of magic undiscovered
detailed_description:
Back to the machick!

The anti-magic toads have returned, stronger and shrouded in mystery, threatening everything once again. In Machick 2, ancient forces awaken as you craft even more powerful wands, uncover hidden secrets, and face an ominous new menace. With greater challenges, untold powers, and countless upgrades, the journey ahead is more perilous than ever. Will you rise to meet the unknown?

New visuals, new features, a totally new world of magic undiscovered
name: Machick 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The anti-magic toads are back, stronger than ever, and the magical chickens are unleashing ancient powers to fight them! With even more wands and powers to master, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and upgrade like never before in Machick 2! Get ready to out-magic the menace!
